content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Let's keep the conversation strictly about the rental price. Please make an offer, and we'll take it from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I would like to rent the apartment for 500 Euro per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand. However, 500 Euro per month does not meet my expectations. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
